mapper.select: SELECT /* DocKeywordMapper.selectDocKeyword */ A.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUIZ_DOCUMENT B WHERE A.KEYWORD = B.DOC_NAME) AS QUIZ_CNT FROM DOCUMENT_KEYWORD A WHERE DOC_NAME = #{doc_name} ORDER BY KEYWORD

SELECT /* DocKeywordMapper.selectDocSearch */ A.DOC_NAME,A.KEYWORD FROM ( SELECT A.DOC_NAME,A.KEYWORD,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (SELECT * FROM DOCUMENT_KEYWORD WHERE KEYWORD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{doc_name},'%')) A LEFT OUTER JOIN QUIZ_DOCUMENT B ON A.DOC_NAME = B.DOC_NAME GROUP BY A.DOC_NAME ) A ORDER BY A.CNT DESC,A.DOC_NAME ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM DOCUMENT_KEYWORD WHERE DOC_NAME = #{doc_name} AND KEYWORD = #{keyword}
